description:
The ...toile elections have started. Shizuma makes her final decision about her relationship with Nagisa when she tells Nagisa she loves her in the middle of the ceremony and the two end up `eloping` just before the announcement of the winner of the election. While Amane and Hikari go forward together as the new ...toiles Shizuma and Nagisa finally consummate their love.
Source: crunchyroll
